description.zh-cn: 中国共产党早期领导人之一，共产国际代表鲍罗廷的翻译，广州起义的主要策划者和领导人，在广州起义中身亡。
description.en: An early leader of the Communist Party of China, translator for Comintern representative Mikhail Borodin, and a key planner and leader of the Guangzhou Uprising, during which he was killed.

description.zh-cn: 张太雷的母校，他于1915年考入其法科，1920年毕业。
description.en: Zhang Tailei's alma mater, where he enrolled in the law department in 1915 and graduated in 1920.

description.zh-cn: 一场发生于1919年的中国反帝、反封建的爱国运动，张太雷曾积极参与。
description.en: An anti-imperialist, anti-feudal, patriotic movement in China in 1919, in which Zhang Tailei actively participated.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党创始人之一，张太雷于1920年10月加入其在北京发起的中国共产党早期组织。
description.en: One of the founders of the Communist Party of China. Zhang Tailei joined the early CPC organization initiated by him in Beijing in October 1920.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。张太雷是其最早的党员之一。
description.en: The ruling party of the People's Republic of China. Zhang Tailei was one of its earliest members.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党早期领导人，曾与张太雷一同加入中共早期组织并开展工人运动。
description.en: An early leader of the Communist Party of China who joined the early CPC organization and carried out labor movements together with Zhang Tailei.

description.zh-cn: 由张太雷在天津组织的青年团体。
description.en: A youth organization in Tianjin founded by Zhang Tailei.

description.zh-cn: 即第三国际，是一个共产党和共产主义组织的国际联合组织。张太雷曾担任其东方局中国科书记。
description.en: Also known as the Third International, it was an international organization of communist parties and organizations. Zhang Tailei served as the secretary of its China Section of the Far Eastern Bureau.

description.zh-cn: 共产国际代表，1921年6月由张太雷陪同来华筹备中共一大。
description.en: A Comintern representative who came to China in June 1921, accompanied by Zhang Tailei, to prepare for the 1st National Congress of the CPC.

description.zh-cn: 赤色职工国际代表，1921年6月由张太雷陪同来华筹备中共一大。
description.en: A Profintern representative who came to China in June 1921, accompanied by Zhang Tailei, to prepare for the 1st National Congress of the CPC.

nodes.id: 中国共产党第一次全国代表大会

zh-cn: 中国共产党第一次全国代表大会
en: 1st National Congress of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的第一次全国代表大会，张太雷参与了会议的筹备工作。
description.en: The first national congress of the Communist Party of China. Zhang Tailei participated in the preparatory work for the congress.

nodes.id: 共产国际第三次代表大会

zh-cn: 共产国际第三次代表大会

description.zh-cn: 共产国际于1921年在莫斯科召开的代表大会，张太雷代表中共出席。
description.en: A congress of the Communist International held in Moscow in 1921, which Zhang Tailei attended as a delegate of the CPC.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党早期主要领导人之一，由张太雷介绍加入中国共产党。
description.en: One of the early main leaders of the Communist Party of China, who was introduced to join the CPC by Zhang Tailei.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治家及军事家，张太雷曾于1923年随其考察苏联。
description.en: A politician and military leader of the Republic of China, whom Zhang Tailei accompanied on an inspection tour of the Soviet Union in 1923.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产主义青年团的前身，张太雷曾于1924年担任其中央书记。
description.en: The predecessor of the Communist Youth League of China. Zhang Tailei served as its Central Secretary in 1924.

description.zh-cn: 1927年中共中央在汉口召开的紧急会议，张太雷在会上同陈独秀路线进行斗争，并被选为中央临时政治局候补委员。
description.en: An emergency meeting held by the CPC Central Committee in Hankou in 1927. At the meeting, Zhang Tailei fought against Chen Duxiu's line and was elected as an alternate member of the provisional Politburo.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党主要创始人及首任总书记，张太雷曾在八七会议上与其路线进行斗争。
description.en: A main founder and the first General Secretary of the Communist Party of China, whose political line was opposed by Zhang Tailei at the 7 August Conference.

description.zh-cn: 由张太雷等人领导的共产主义起义，张太雷在起义第二天身亡。
description.en: A communist uprising led by Zhang Tailei and others. Zhang Tailei was killed on the second day of the uprising.

description.zh-cn: 共产国际代表，张太雷在广州起义中遇袭身亡时，正与他同乘一辆汽车。
description.en: A Comintern representative who was in the same car with Zhang Tailei when Zhang was attacked and killed during the Guangzhou Uprising.

description.zh-cn: 一个反共的工会组织，其民兵在广州起义期间杀害了张太雷。
description.en: An anti-communist trade union whose militia killed Zhang Tailei during the Guangzhou Uprising.

description.zh-cn: 张太雷的原配夫人。
description.en: Zhang Tailei's first wife.

description.zh-cn: 施存统的前妻，后与施离婚并改嫁张太雷。
description.en: Shi Cuntong's ex-wife, who later divorced him and married Zhang Tailei.

description.zh-cn: 张太雷与陆静华的大女儿。
description.en: The eldest daughter of Zhang Tailei and Lu Jinghua.

description.zh-cn: 张太雷与陆静华的二女儿。
description.en: The second daughter of Zhang Tailei and Lu Jinghua.

description.zh-cn: 张太雷与陆静华的儿子。
description.en: The son of Zhang Tailei and Lu Jinghua.

description.zh-cn: 张太雷与王一知的儿子。
description.en: The son of Zhang Tailei and Wang Yizhi.

description.zh-cn: 王一知的原配丈夫。
description.en: Wang Yizhi's first husband.

description.zh-cn: 共产国际代表，张太雷曾担任其翻译。
description.en: A Comintern representative for whom Zhang Tailei served as a translator.

description.zh-cn: 张太雷的出生地。
description.en: The birthplace of Zhang Tailei.

description.zh-cn: 张太雷的逝世地点。
description.en: The place where Zhang Tailei died.

description.zh-cn: 张太雷于1915年考入天津北洋大学法科，并于1920年毕业。
description.en: Zhang Tailei was admitted to the Department of Law at Peiyang University in Tianjin in 1915 and graduated in 1920.

description.zh-cn: 张太雷于1919年积极参加五四运动。
description.en: Zhang Tailei actively participated in the May Fourth Movement in 1919.

description.zh-cn: 1920年10月，张太雷加入李大钊发起成立的北京的中国共产党早期组织，成为中国共产党最早的党员之一。
description.en: In October 1920, Zhang Tailei joined the early CPC organization in Beijing, initiated by Li Dazhao, becoming one of the first members of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 返回天津后，张太雷组织了天津社会主义青年团。
description.en: After returning to Tianjin, Zhang Tailei organized the Tianjin Socialist Youth League.

position.en: Secretary of the China Section of the Far Eastern Bureau

description.zh-cn: 1921年春，张太雷被派往苏俄伊尔库茨克，任共产国际东方局中国科书记。
description.en: In the spring of 1921, Zhang Tailei was sent to Irkutsk, Soviet Russia, to serve as the Secretary of the China Section of the Far Eastern Bureau of the Comintern.

relationships.target: 中国共产党第一次全国代表大会

description.zh-cn: 1921年6月，张太雷陪同共产国际代表马林和赤色职工国际代表尼克尔斯基来中国，筹备召开中共一大。
description.en: In June 1921, Zhang Tailei accompanied Comintern representative Maring and Profintern representative Nikolski to China to prepare for the 1st National Congress of the CPC.

relationships.target: 共产国际第三次代表大会

description.zh-cn: 张太雷代表中国共产党出席了在莫斯科举行的共产国际第三次代表大会。
description.en: Zhang Tailei attended the 3rd World Congress of the Comintern in Moscow as a delegate of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 在出席共产国际三大期间，张太雷介绍瞿秋白加入中国共产党。
description.en: While attending the 3rd World Congress of the Comintern, Zhang Tailei introduced Qu Qiubai to join the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 1924年，张太雷任中国社会主义青年团中央书记。
description.en: In 1924, Zhang Tailei served as the Central Secretary of the Chinese Socialist Youth League.

description.zh-cn: 在1927年的八七会议上，张太雷同陈独秀的路线进行了斗争。
description.en: At the 7 August Conference in 1927, Zhang Tailei struggled against Chen Duxiu's political line.

description.zh-cn: 张太雷是广州起义的主要策划者和领导人。
description.en: Zhang Tailei was the main planner and leader of the Guangzhou Uprising.

description.zh-cn: 1927年12月12日下午，张太雷遭遇反共的“广州机器工会”民兵截击，中弹身亡。
description.en: On the afternoon of December 12, 1927, Zhang Tailei was intercepted and killed by the militia of the anti-communist 'Guangzhou Machine Workers' Union'.

description.zh-cn: 陆静华是张太雷的原配夫人，两人于1918年结婚。
description.en: Lu Jinghua was Zhang Tailei's first wife; they married in 1918.

description.zh-cn: 张太雷于1925年与王一知结婚。
description.en: Zhang Tailei married Wang Yizhi in 1925.

description.zh-cn: 王一知原为施存统的夫人，后与其离婚。
description.en: Wang Yizhi was originally the wife of Shi Cuntong, whom she later divorced.

description.zh-cn: 张太雷曾担任共产国际代表鲍罗廷的翻译。
description.en: Zhang Tailei served as the translator for Comintern representative Mikhail Borodin.

description.zh-cn: 1923年8月，张太雷随蒋中正考察苏联。
description.en: In August 1923, Zhang Tailei accompanied Chiang Kai-shek on an inspection tour of the Soviet Union.
